subject: RE: [junit] A Growing Problem
msgSnippet: ... If you have a large system that can t be tested in small doses then you have problems that JUnit can t solve.
messageBody:
>> And that JUnit fail after one test fails, so what? You want
>> all tests to pass so if one fails, find it, fix your code,
>> and go again.
>
> This can be a big problem in large systems that take minutes
> (or longer) to compile and test. It's nice to get a complete
> list of failures so that you can attempt to fix as many as
> possible before having to dive into the build process again...

If you have a large system that can't be tested in small doses then you have
problems that JUnit can't solve.
